title: A House in Fez by Suzanna Clarke
description:
Purchasing a house in one of the oldest parts of the Medina in Fez, the old Moroccan capital, would be a challenge that most of us would shy away from.

But Suzanna Clarke and her husband Sandy McCutcheon say that despite the obvious drawbacks of purchasing a 300 year old house on the other side of the world, the cultural and historical richness of Morocco awakens all their senses.

They had no idea on how to go about buying a house in Fez and the arguments for and against were endless.

What about the language difficulties?

Genre: Autobiography, Non-Fiction
